title: Sometimes firefox does not recognize links as "links"?
content:
Hey.

I don't know if it's a "problem" or it's really right.

What you need to do for see an example of what I'm saying: 1. Open Telegram Web (web.telegram.org/k/) 2. Right click on any link 3. Right click again, over the link

You'll see a normal options menu, FF is not recognizing as a link So, because of that we can't open links using private window

I don't think anyone has noticed that yet.
creator: saynotozucker

title: Push Notification when site is closed
content:
Problem: not receiving calendar.google.com notifications when the tab is closed. Question: does push notifications work when the site is closed?

--- Version: Firefox 94.0.1 Google Calendar Web Push notifications work well when the tab is open. Site is allowed notifications permission. All notification settings in calendar.google.com are set up.
creator: mstfelg

title: language-unknown language to English
content: My Firefox browser is in a foreign language-I think Russian, I don't know how it happened but I want it back to English. I can't understand the language so I am unable to access my saved logins from my android phone or to change the language. PLEASE HELP with step by step and picture instructions. PLEASE AND THANK YPU
creator: theshannon

title: microphone for forefox
content:
I have a Chromebook HP 360 running Linux Today I used Linux and managed to get Firefox to work on my Chromebook it works fantastic except for one issue

I can't seem to get a microphone that will work with anything but Bing so if I asked Bing a question I can use the microphone

what I want to do is type in Facebook Messenger or write an email and use a microphone to do it the microphone on my Chromebook in my accessibility features will only work with my Chromebook it won't work with a Firefox browserÂ is there an add-on somewhere that I can use that I can't find that will accomplish what I'm trying to do.

It's so much easier to tap the microphone button and then speak instead of type especially if I have a long letter to write.
creator: mdcc1022

title: finding way to sync two firefox browsers in 100%
content: i actually logged in in firefox on my pc and laptop everything is synced, bookmarks passwords history plugins, but not the tabs, tabs only appears in account button as "firefox of user [user] in system [sys-name]" but i want to have all tabs openned on laptop like on pc and when i open or close one tab on laptop it appear on pc to be oppened or closed, how to manage that.
creator: mkmethospl
